description:
The two Yin princes, Yinxiao and Yinhong, return from their training on Mount Kunlun and show off their new Paopei. Prince Yinxiao tries to force the armies of the North and West into joining the Yin by placing seals on  Taikoubou and his friends. Meanwhile, there is a creature wrecking havoc on the people in Chouka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Brothers Return to the Wilderness
兄弟, 荒野に帰還す
